Articles.Content: I'm always curious what people do here besides KSP well I'm a bowler and pretty decent at it. I'm in the State tournament here at Kentucky and I bowled in two other tournaments in the past 24 hours. Sadly I bowled way too much and now dealing with a blood blister in ring finger and I bowl some tomorrow...I miss playing KSP lol. BTW my highest game I bowled is a 300
What sort of bowls do you mean do you mean like ten pin Bowling or Bowls?
I bowled once. I'm horrifyingly bad at it and fell over once and had to stop. :v
